title: Drawing, Design for Stage Curtain: Temple of Fame, ca. 1815
title_raw: Design for Stage Curtain: Temple of Fame
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over black chalk on wove paper.
inscribed:
"Metas"
"ORFEO, CIMAROSA, ARISTOFANE, GOLDONI, SOFFOCLE, ALFIERI." 
Inscription below: "Teatro delle muse."
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Vertical Rectangle. Variation of design 3181. Putto raises tablet with inscription "METAS" [tasio]  near monument at left. No hermae shown, but upon entablature lie wreaths and frieze inscribed with names "ORFEO, CIMAROSA, ARISTOFANE, GOLDONI, SOFFOCLE, ALFIERI." Inscription below: "Teatro delle muse."

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Stage Curtain: Temple of Fame, ca. 1815. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over black chalk on wove paper.. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3184.
